list_definition.definition: the hair that grows on the chin
a group of hair-like tufts on an ear of corn

list_ex_of_english: They draw pictures of strangers who are all 6 ft 9 in tall and have black beards and electric eyes.
Men have to apply and get permission to grow beards.
We in this country have the weird idea that the youngsters are immoral and peculiar, and that because they have long hair and beards they are to be despised.
I am not myself put off by long hair and beards, though some are.
I am sure that you will not forget beards either.
Wanted people come in cars having grown beards and equipped themselves with a false identity.
They went through a difficult time in which they were greatly criticised as being "arty-crafty", bearded and shaggy.
Suddenly a frail-looking man with white hair and beard and blazing eyes slipped into the room.
